about.title: About Us
about.welcome: Welcome to FHD Industrial Automation, your trusted partner in hydraulic and pneumatic automation solutions.
about.p1: Since our foundation in the city of Sumaré, São Paulo state, we have been passionately dedicated to providing high-quality services and innovative solutions for the most challenging industrial needs.
about.p2: With a team of experienced and dedicated specialists, FHD Industrial Automation stands out as a leader in the sector, offering a wide range of specialized services to meet the constantly evolving market demands.

card.title: Industrial Automation
card.desc: Experts in hydraulic and pneumatic solutions to optimize your industrial processes with cutting-edge technology and proven results.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: We drive industrial progress with excellence in hydraulic and pneumatic automation. We provide innovative and reliable solutions, exceeding expectations and building strong relationships based on trust, integrity, and quality.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: We seek global leadership in industrial automation, promoting efficiency, sustainability, and innovation. With strategic partnerships and investments in technology, we are the first choice for excellence in hydraulic and pneumatic automation solutions.

values.title: Values
values.content: We strive for service excellence and customer satisfaction. Innovation drives our progress; we act with integrity and transparency. Passionate about our work, we exceed expectations with exceptional results.
